Parking_Notes: 0 spaces if ADU <1,000 sf or within 0.5 mi of major transit; otherwise 1 space/ADU.

Process_Type: ADU use permitted; building permit only.

Notes: ADU standards apply on any lot where a single-family dwelling is allowed; critical areas and greenscape overlays may further modify standards.
ADU_Parking_Exempt_If_Transit: Yes, if within 0.5 mi of major transit stop.
ADU_Conversion_Notes: Conversions from existing structures (including garages and guest cottages) allowed; some may exceed 1,200 sf per 20.20.120.
ADU_Site_Limit_Notes: Max 2 ADUs per SF lot; no new ADU on unit lot already using ADU provisions.
DADU_Setback_Notes: DADU uses middle-housing dimensions and may be on alley lot line.
Critical_Area_Notes: Setbacks may be modified in Critical Areas Overlay (20.25H).
Greenscape_Notes: Front-yard greenscape ≥50%; cannot reduce below minimum (footnote 40).

Zone_Type: Professional Office (allows one dwelling unit accessory to office use)
Parking_Notes: 0 spaces if ADU <1,000 sf or within 0.5 mi of major transit; otherwise 1 space/ADU.
Alley_Access_Allowed: Yes for DADU; alley lot line allowed.
Owner_Occupancy_Notes: Where a dwelling is allowed in PO, no separate owner-occupancy condition for ADU in 20.20.120.
Design_Standards_Notes: Attached ADU must meet setbacks of the dwelling; DADU follows detached accessory and middle-housing standards (20.20.125, 20.20.538).
Process_Type: ADU use permitted where a single-family dwelling is present; building permit only.
Affordability_Requirements: Overall site remains governed by PO dimensional limits; affordable/mixed-use provisions in 20.20.128 may apply to residential components.
Notes: PO is primarily office; one accessory dwelling unit is allowed by the use chart; where present, up to two ADUs may be added under 20.20.120.
ADU_Parking_Exempt_If_Transit: Yes, if within 0.5 mi of major transit stop.
ADU_Conversion_Notes: Conversions from existing accessory structures allowed where a dwelling exists.
ADU_Site_Limit_Notes: Max 2 ADUs per SF lot with a dwelling; no new ADU on unit lot already using ADU provisions.
DADU_Setback_Notes: DADU uses detached accessory and middle-housing standards; other PO setbacks still apply.
Critical_Area_Notes: Setbacks may be modified in Critical Areas Overlay (20.25H).
Greenscape_Notes: Front-yard greenscape requirement not specified for PO in Chart 20.20.010; other landscaping rules apply.

Parking_Notes: Per SMC 20.40.210(E) (as amended): one additional off-street space required for ADU unless lot is within 1/2 mile of a major transit stop, in which case no additional off-street parking is required.

Design_Standards_Notes: "ADUs follow principal setbacks; DADUs use accessory setbacks"

Affordability_Requirements: None
Notes: Max 1200 sf; interior exception; 2 ADUs per lot
